Citation.sTitle: Enthalpies of transfer of amino acids from water to aqueous solutions of N-methylformamide and N,N-dimethylformamide at T = 298.15K
Citation.sAbstract: Enthalpies of solution of glycine, l-alanine and l-serine in aqueous solutions ofN-methylformamide andN,N-dimethylformamide were measured at 298.15 K. Enthalpies of transfer ( trH) of amino acids from water to aqueous solutions of amides were derived and interpreted in terms of structural interaction. The results were compared with those in aqueous formamide solutions.
